name: Common Utilities
description: Comprehensive development utilities with modern CLI tools, shell configurations, and customizable tool bundles. Includes modern shell tools (starship, zoxide, eza, bat), web development tools, networking utilities, Kubernetes tools, and system utilities with granular configuration options.

defaultShell.description: Default shell to set for the user

bat.description: Install bat (modern cat with syntax highlighting)

networking.description: Install networking bundle (ssh, nmap, curl, wget, iperf3, tcpdump, network tools)

webDev.description: Install web development bundle (httpie, jq, yq, dasel, gron, miller, hq, config tools)

kubernetes.description: Install Kubernetes bundle (kubectl, k9s, helm, flux, kustomize)

utilities.description: Install utilities bundle (git, fd, ripgrep, database clients, system tools)

configureForRoot.description: Also configure shells for root user

completions.description: Install shell completions for CLI tools

motd.description: Install custom Message of the Day (MOTD)

motdLogo.description: MOTD logo/banner - 'onezero' for default, 'none' to disable, or custom ASCII art

motdInstructions.description: Custom instructions to display in MOTD (e.g., 'Run npm start to begin development')

motdNotice.description: Custom notice/warning to display in MOTD (e.g., 'Development environment - not for production')

buildTools.description: Install build tools (build-essential, cmake, pkg-config) in utilities bundle

databaseClients.description: Install database clients (postgresql, sqlite3, redis) in web-dev bundle

githubCli.description: Install GitHub CLI tools (gh, glab) in utilities bundle
